scenario_text.value: I kinda understand the way Falcomon feels.
I used to be the same way till recently.

I worked so hard for Shuuji,
but he didn’t care about me.

I didn’t know what to do and felt scared
and sad... It hurt.

Nope! Now I know how Shuuji feels and I wanna
work hard together with him!

I think Falcomon and Minoru will get back to
the way they used to be.

(But can I do anything to help make
that happen?)

I think being able to talk about how
we feel helps us understand each other.
